lead_paragraph: The U.S.A.-1 team in the 2011 Bermuda Bowl world team championship will be Martin Fleisher, Michael Kamil, Bobby Levin, Steve Weinstein, Chip Martel and Lew Stansby.
snippet: The U.S.A.-1 team in the 2011 Bermuda Bowl world team championship will be Martin Fleisher, Michael Kamil, Bobby Levin, Steve Weinstein, Chip Martel and Lew Stansby.

headline.main: Leading Only Winning Card Wins Team a Bermuda Berth
headline.print_headline: Leading Only Winning Card Wins Team a Bermuda Berth
